notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from National Library of Scotland.
Verses, probably printed in Scotland, relating to the defeat of the Cameronian covenating forces at the battle of Bothwell Bridge in July 1679.
Irregular pagination: [1], 6, 7, 4, 5, 2, 3, 8, 9, 14, 15, 12, 13, 10, 11, 16. Pagination corresponds to appropriate part of text, but the text is printed out of order.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
